message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I believe this split reflects the urgency for both of us to settle early, given the inflation.
Alice, your offer was tempting, but I believe a more even split is fair. This reflects the increasing pressure on your side due to the higher inflation rate.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but letting this drag on hurts us both. This offer is a compromise, and I urge you to consider it carefully. Time is literally money for us.
